@Service public class SessionPlayerServiceImpl extends Object implements SessionPlayerService
Class to manage the player service. Implements SessionPlayerService interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • SessionPlayerServiceImpl

      @Autowired public SessionPlayerServiceImpl(org.modelmapper.ModelMapper modelMapper, org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder, SessionPlayerRepository sessionPlayerRepository, PlayerRepository playerRepository)
      Implements classes that are required for the player service.
      Parameters:
      modelMapper - ModelMapper to map objects from one class to another.
      passwordEncoder - Password encoder to encode the password of the player.
      sessionPlayerRepository - SessionPlayer repository to access session player data from the database.
      playerRepository - Player repository to access player data from the database.

  • Method Details

    • registerNewUser

      public SessionPlayerDTO registerNewUser(SessionPlayerDTO sessionPlayerDTO)
      Registers a new player in the database. Change the class of the sessionPlayer to SessionPlayerEntity. Encrypt the password of the sessionPlayer. Transform the sessionPlayerDTO to a PlayerEntity, set a default role for the player, and save it and the sessionPlayer in the database. Returns the sessionPlayerDTO has saved in the database.
      Specified by:
      registerNewUser in interface SessionPlayerService
      Parameters:
      sessionPlayerDTO - Player to register.
      Returns:
      SessionPlayerDTO Player registered.
      See Also:
      • The class to manage the session player.
      • The class to manage the player.

    • loginUser

      public SessionPlayerDTO loginUser(SessionPlayerDTO sessionPlayerDTO)
      Method to log in a player. Change the class of the player to PlayerEntity. Search the player by name in the database. Check if the password matches the password in the database. If the player exists and the password matches, return the player information. If the player does not exist or the password does not match, return null.
      Specified by:
      loginUser in interface SessionPlayerService
      Parameters:
      sessionPlayerDTO - SessionPlayerDTO with the player information.
      Returns:
      AuthResponseDTO with the authentication response.

    • existsByName

      public boolean existsByName(String name)
      Verifies if the player exists by name in the database.
      Specified by:
      existsByName in interface SessionPlayerService
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.
      Returns:
      True if the player exists in the database, false if not.
